overview:
Four Green Steps is the World’s largest Green marketplace, offering an eco-friendly alternative to virtually every product. Altruistically-motivated and focused on making ‘Green’ accessible and easier than ever, the site features a free ecological curriculum used by over 600 000 students in 43 countries, as well as many other features including:

-Vegan & Vegetarian Recipes -Green Living Tips -Current Health & Environmental News -CERwire documenting relevant press releases of businesses that have made sustainable, eco-friendly efforts recently. -Writing opportunities for students of environmental journalism -Internship programs with both McGill & Concordia University.
